content: @Grahame Grieve - i was testing out sending transaction Bundles to your DSTU2 server today. in the fullUrl value for each Bundle

ok first time poster, hit CR before done ... anyway in fullUrl, i forgot to replace "example.org" with your base URL, but the server was okay with it and in the response showed your base URL in the fullUrls that you sent back. the question is: is that considered standard behavior? i can't find a spec that would say so. I'm not complaining, just making sure that sending a dummy hostname is okay. thanks
good question. my transaction support is patchy; hopefully I'll get it fully aligned witn DSTU2 by Montreal (way to slow, sorry)
so no guarantee my server is correct here
